title:
Throttle Valve Potentiometer (Double Signal),
Multec/Trionic (MY 2001, MY 2002 and MY 2003), Simtec (MY 2001 and
MY 2002)

steps.text:
Depress the accelerator pedal quickly down to the
limit stop and then release it again.

Download Setup file (the Tech 32 uses only Setup
files, no reference curves).
Start the engine and allow it to idle.

Depress the accelerator pedal quickly down to the
limit stop and then release it again.
